sentence.value: Colonel Charles Edward ("Chuck") Jones (November 4, 1952 – September 11, 2001) was a United States Air Force officer, a computer programmer, and an astronaut in the USAF Manned Spaceflight Engineer Program.
sentence.tree: nsubj(officer/NN-27,Colonel/NNP-1) nn(Jones/NNP-9,Charles/NNP-2) nn(Jones/NNP-9,Edward/NNP-3) dep(Jones/NNP-9,Chuck/NNP-6) dep(Colonel/NNP-1,Jones/NNP-9) dep(Colonel/NNP-1,November/NNP-11) num(November/NNP-11,4/CD-12) num(November/NNP-11,1952/CD-14) dep(November/NNP-11,September/NNP-16) num(September/NNP-16,11/CD-17) num(September/NNP-16,2001/CD-19) cop(officer/NN-27,was/VBD-21) det(officer/NN-27,a/DT-22) nn(officer/NN-27,United/NNP-23) nn(officer/NN-27,States/NNP-24) nn(officer/NN-27,Air/NNP-25) nn(officer/NN-27,Force/NNP-26) det(programmer/NN-31,a/DT-29) nn(programmer/NN-31,computer/NN-30) conj_and(officer/NN-27,programmer/NN-31) det(astronaut/NN-35,an/DT-34) conj_and(officer/NN-27,astronaut/NN-35) det(Program/NNP-42,the/DT-37) nn(Program/NNP-42,USAF/NNP-38) nn(Program/NNP-42,Manned/NNP-39) nn(Program/NNP-42,Spaceflight/NNP-40) nn(Program/NNP-42,Engineer/NNP-41) prep_in(astronaut/NN-35,Program/NNP-42)

sentence.value: Jones was born in Clinton, Indiana.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Jones was born in Clinton, Indiana.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Jones was born in Clinton, Indiana.

sentence.value: He graduated from Wichita High School East in 1970 and earned a bachelor of science in astronautical engineering from the United States Air Force Academy in 1974.
sentence.tree: nsubj(graduated/VBD-2,He/PRP-1) nsubj(earned/VBD-11,He/PRP-1) nn(East/NNP-7,Wichita/NNP-4) nn(East/NNP-7,High/NNP-5) nn(East/NNP-7,School/NNP-6) prep_from(graduated/VBD-2,East/NNP-7) prep_in(East/NNP-7,1970/CD-9) conj_and(graduated/VBD-2,earned/VBD-11) det(bachelor/NN-13,a/DT-12) dobj(earned/VBD-11,bachelor/NN-13) prep_of(bachelor/NN-13,science/NN-15) amod(engineering/NN-18,astronautical/JJ-17) prep_in(science/NN-15,engineering/NN-18) det(Academy/NNP-25,the/DT-20) nn(Academy/NNP-25,United/NNP-21) nn(Academy/NNP-25,States/NNP-22) nn(Academy/NNP-25,Air/NNP-23) nn(Academy/NNP-25,Force/NNP-24) prep_from(earned/VBD-11,Academy/NNP-25) prep_in(earned/VBD-11,1974/CD-27)

sentence.value: He entered the USAF Manned Spaceflight Engineer program in 1982, and was scheduled to fly on mission STS-71-B in December 1986, but the mission was cancelled after the Challenger Disaster in January 1986.
sentence.tree: nsubj(entered/VBD-2,He/PRP-1) nsubjpass(scheduled/VBN-14,He/PRP-1) det(program/NN-8,the/DT-3) nn(program/NN-8,USAF/NNP-4) nn(program/NN-8,Manned/NNP-5) nn(program/NN-8,Spaceflight/NNP-6) nn(program/NN-8,Engineer/NNP-7) dobj(entered/VBD-2,program/NN-8) prep_in(program/NN-8,1982/CD-10) auxpass(scheduled/VBN-14,was/VBD-13) conj_and(entered/VBD-2,scheduled/VBN-14) aux(fly/VB-16,to/TO-15) xcomp(scheduled/VBN-14,fly/VB-16) nn(STS-71-B/NN-19,mission/NN-18) prep_on(fly/VB-16,STS-71-B/NN-19) prep_in(STS-71-B/NN-19,December/NNP-21) num(December/NNP-21,1986/CD-22) det(mission/NN-26,the/DT-25) nsubjpass(cancelled/VBN-28,mission/NN-26) auxpass(cancelled/VBN-28,was/VBD-27) conj_but(entered/VBD-2,cancelled/VBN-28) det(Disaster/NN-32,the/DT-30) nn(Disaster/NN-32,Challenger/NNP-31) prep_after(cancelled/VBN-28,Disaster/NN-32) prep_in(cancelled/VBN-28,January/NNP-34) num(January/NNP-34,1986/CD-35)

sentence.value: He was killed at the age of 48 in the attacks of September 11, 2001, aboard American Airlines Flight 11.
